content.query:
ALTER TABLE dbo.FactClaimDetails
ADD IsExternalTPAClaim BIT DEFAULT 0UPDATE E
SET E.IsExternalTPAClaim = 0
FROM FactClaimDetails E
WHERE
E.IsExternalTPAClaim IS NULL
​[Yesterday 10:38 PM] Ashok Kumar V
    
ALTER TABLE dbo.DimMemberDetails
ADD IsExternalTPA BIT DEFAULT 0UPDATE E
SET E.IsExternalTPA = 0
FROM DimMemberDetails E
WHERE
E.IsExternalTPA IS NULL
​[Yesterday 10:38 PM] Ashok Kumar V
    
ALTER TABLE dbo.DimMembers
ADD IsExternalTPA BIT DEFAULT 0UPDATE E
SET E.IsExternalTPA = 0
FROM DimMembers E
WHERE
E.IsExternalTPA IS NULL
